text:
These 2 common attributes of the Host container are missing in Tomcat 6 documentation (https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/host.html) : xmlValidation, xmlNamespaceAware

They are removed since Tomcat 7, so only Tomcat 6 doc needs an update.
creator: aterrestris@gmail.com

text:
You are wrong.

xmlNamespaceAware attribute of StandardHost has no effect at all.

xmlValidation attribute of StandardHost has no effect either. (It is read in TldConfig.init(), but the value is assigned to a local variable that is never read and thus has no effect).

There is no need to document those attributes. If you want to configure those settings per-Host, it is possible to set them in a host-specific context file (/conf/[enginename]/[hostname]/context.xml.default)

https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/context.html#Defining_a_context
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
